body_html:
With the update, the delay is on the order of minutes to cuda a model, whereas previously it was just a few seconds, so it seems like something is wrong
…
On Feb 19, 2018 23:18, "Tongzhou Wang" ***@***.***> wrote: The cuda context is lazily initialized, so it's expected that the first cuda() call is slower. — You are receiving this because you authored the thread. body:
With the update, the delay is on the order of minutes to cuda a model,
whereas previously it was just a few seconds, so it seems like something is
wrong

On Feb 19, 2018 23:18, "Tongzhou Wang" <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> The cuda context is lazily initialized, so it's expected that the first
> cuda() call is slower.
>
> —
